body.name: Keurig K-Mini Plus Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Studio Gray

features: WHAT'S IN THE BOX: Keurig K-Mini Plus single serve coffee maker, pod storage unit that fits in your brewer and can hold up to 9 K-Cup pods.Filter type:Reusable
FITS ANYWHERE: Less than 5 inches wide, perfect for small spaces.
STRONG BREW: Brew a stronger, more intense cup.
YOUR PERFECT AMOUNT: Brew any cup size between 6-12oz with Keurig K-Cup pods.
REMOVABLE ONE CUP RESERVOIR: Just add fresh water for each brew. Removable reservoir makes for easy cleaning and filling.
FAST & FRESH BREWED: Coffee made in minutes.
POD STORAGE: Holds 9 K-Cup pods and fits in your brewer for ultimate portability and saves counter space.
CORD STORAGE: For easy transport and tidy countertops.
TRAVEL MUG FRIENDLY: Removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7.0 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
body.description: The Keurig K-Mini Plus single serve coffee maker in Studio Gray features a new sleek design, and at less than 5 inches wide is the perfect size for any space or occasion. The K-Mini Plus brewer is effortlessly simple to use, just add fresh water to the removable reservoir, pop in your favorite K-Cup pod, press the brew button and enjoy fresh brewed, delicious coffee in minutes. Choose from hundreds of delicious K-Cup pod varieties to enjoy 6-12oz of your favorite coffee, tea, cocoa, and iced beverages. And for those who like a bolder brew, select the Strong button to increase the strength and bold taste of your coffee. With a single cup removable reservoir, a pod storage unit to store 9 of your favorite K-Cup pods, and cord storage, the K-Mini Plus coffee maker is the portable brewer that makes anywhere perfect for great coffee. The K-Mini Plus coffee maker is available in a variety of matte finish colors with silver detailing on the handle and drip tray. Based on consumer feedback, we have updated the K-Mini Plus Brewer. Customer reviews have been removed that relate to the previous version of the brewer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Brands You Love 2 K-Cup Pod

Why did you change the shape of the Keurig K-Mini Plus single serve coffee maker? We have updated the K-Mini Plus coffee maker with a new, sleek design. At less than 5” wide, the K-Mini coffee maker is our slimmest coffee maker. What type of pods are compatible with the Keurig K-Mini Plus coffee maker? The K-Mini Plus coffee maker brews Keurig K-Cup pods. It does not brew K-Carafe pods, K-Mug pods, Vue pods, or Rivo pods. Can I use the My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter with the Keurig K-Mini Plus coffee maker? Yes, the K-Mini Plus coffee maker is compatible with the Keurig My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter. Can I adjust the size of my beverage with the Keurig K-Mini Plus single serve coffee maker? Yes, the Keurig K-Mini Plus coffee maker brews any cup size between 6-12oz depending on how much water you pour into the reservoir. Does the Keurig K-Mini Plus have auto off? Yes, the Keurig K-Mini Plus coffee maker will automatically turn off 90 seconds after the last brew.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Received an upgraded Kerig K-Iced model today
reviews.reviewText: Kerig received with coupons that expired May 2023, a red flag. It would not work, trouble shooting done by manufacturer. Findings were defective purchase with an expired warranty. This happened the day item was received. Asked to send pics of pot with my name, date of purchase on paper in front of pot, model number, copy of proof of purchase, copy of post office tracking and delivery. Told no need to return, trash or recycle. After pics were received, immediately received email the info ie pics were not acceptable. Upon receiving Kerig a replacement would be sent. Followed by request for my physical address (I use PO Box) as UPS would pic item up at place of abode. I then receive email with bar code to use at Staples to return via UPS. So today after inconsistencies I’m going to Stables hopefully for a successful return. Problem is at manufacture in that they mail item not Amazon. They do not check model numbers, warranty expirations, and sell useless items. Poor PR for consumers. Forgot to mention the troubleshooter asked if had K pod in pot. Answered no, and stated per directions one is to first run water through FIRST before making first cup of coffee.Today February 1, 2024 I received email your Kerig is on the way. Unfortunately to physical address and not mailing address. I have PO Box for safety, live in multi apartment building where others take packages of others. This was explained in detail when they requested physical address. First Kerig was mailed to PO Box, so why not replacement?? If it is stolen as many packages are I’m in for more corespondency, and will request refund to charge card used for payment.Replacement Kerig mailed Monday of this week via UPS and received today Wednesday. The coffee maker works fine and I like the upgrade, btw no additional cost. It comes with large water reservoir so no need to add water for each cup. When warm weather come will try ice coffee feature, I’m sure it will work fine too. It took some time to resolve issue but it is now resolved. I would purchase Kerig products again, good maker, and customer support is accommodating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great unit for single use or couples
reviews.reviewText: I've owned several Keurigs in the past, including the ill fated Vue. I like this unit the best of all of them. But you have to understand it intended use and how it works to appreciate it.1st, it doesn't pre-heat and stay hot like the bigger, multi-person units, when they are simply turned on. It only starts to heat when you press the big brew button. Once it's done with the brew the heater turns off, meaning it needs to pre-heat again for any additional cups.2nd, after you press the brew button, you have to be patient as, unlike the multi-person, larger and more expensive units, it has to heat the cold water. For me and my cold tap water, this takes just under 3 minutes before the cup is complete. In the end, this unit is much more energy efficient as it isn't always heating when simply turned on.4rd, if you are a single or maybe two person coffee household, this unit is perfect. If you have 3 or more drinkers or throw a lot of gatherings where coffee would be served, the bigger and more expensive multi-cup units would be better for you.What sets this unit apart from others is :1) It's really small and doesn't take up much counter space, built-in cord storage and coffee bin are nice as well2) It's really easy to keep clean, as there aren't a dozen things to take apart to clean or difficult places to try and shove paper towel into.3) Does a good hot cup of coffee, no need to adjust temperature as it's comes up too hot to drink right away... Like a coffee maker should!4) Water bin is easy to add/remove, easy to fill, easy to clean, easy to dry - compared to the multi-cup makers5) Unlike other makers, the design is clean, modern, yet simple and doesn't have stupid curves or wasted spaces. This makes the unit easy to add water, brew, use and clean comparably6) The design is so efficient that there's not a single drip, at least for me, once the brew is done. I'm used to other Keurigs which drip for a minute or two afterwards.The one design issue that affects impatient people is that the brew LED seems to have no rime or reason. You really can't rely on it to determine what step it is in during the brew. I just press the brew button, verify the LED is no longer solid for a couple seconds and walk away for a few minutes or listen for the empty air sound that occurs at the end of the brew cycle if I'm in the kitchen doing other things.In the end I highly recommend this maker for single or dual-household coffee drinkers or those who drink coffee irregularly. However, if you are an impatient person who can't value a small, easy to maintain, energy efficient coffee maker with a simple design, you will hate this coffee maker. It's coffee people, not rocket science. The quality and age of the coffee and pod design/filter are the most important factors. The coffee maker just disperses a controlled amount of hot water to the overall process. In this last factor, I find this unit to excel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my elderly father who had recently complained that he didn't drink coffee much anymore because "making a cup (decaf) just for myself is too much work". This has been perfect for him. Could it have better flavor? Sure, it isn't meant to be a gourmet top notch coffee machine, not for the price point. This is meant for ease of use and simplicity and it does not disappoint. Even my small coffee drinking kiddos come to grandpa to make a cup of decaf with him and can maneuver the machine all on their own. I also love the fact (for my dad) that there are so many varieties of K-cups for him to chose from. I wish there were more decaf "flavors" as I have only been able to find hazelnut for fun flavors but I guess that is where coffee creamers come into play so it's not a complaint. The color is so beautiful, a nice cool robin eggs blue-gray.I know the waste of the pods is an issue up for discussion but for my dad the convenience is really nice and I got him a couple of the k-cup reusable metal baskets to put his own ground coffee in. So far I have had zero issue in leaking or any other issues with the coffee machine. My dad loves it and that is perfect for me!
I’ve only just made my first cup but I love it! So easy right out of the box. Take the tape off, run one cup of water through to clean system out and you’re good to go. Also very slim design!
The media could not be loaded. Me encantó
Works great, saves space and looks awesome.I bought refillable cartridges because my objection to these were environmental and also coffee choices were limited.
La daré para un regalo, entonces aun no se que tan buena salga. Pero en cuanto pueda ver el funcionamiento del producto, daré una segunda opinión, al menos venia super bien embalada y llegó rápido.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: K-mini Plus Coffee Maker NOT suitable for UK use
reviews.reviewText: We bought this product after using one in the USA in August. I ordered from the UK but I didn't realise it wouldn't work over here with just a US to UK adapter plug (I should have done more research).When I plugged Keurig K-Mini Plus Coffee Maker in, the circuit tripped in the house and the conductor on the coffee maker blew. Short of replacing the circuit board and coffee maker is now dead.In short, don't buy this product if you live in the UK unless you plan on having a large voltage transformer converter sitting on your bench as well.
